content: Building dynamic, scalable web applications with seamless front-end and robust back-end integration. Passionate about optimizing performance, security, and user experience across the full stack.

Breaking down complex problems into efficient solutions using coding logic, algorithms, and DSA to optimize performance. Designing and managing robust databases, ensuring data integrity, query optimization, and efficient data handling.
Designing and simulating efficient circuits for real-world applications. Integrating IoT and electronics to create smart, connected systems.
